contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "denarii" is the plural of "denarius. "Alternate translation: "The amount of bread that cost two hundred days' wages" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bmoney ]])
contextId.glQuote: Two hundred denarii worth of bread

contextId.occurrenceNote: A denarius was the amount of silver that a common laborer could earn in one day of work. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bmoney ]])
